Title: Establishes additional procedures to be followed by industrial development agencies prior to making development loans
Summary: Establishes additional procedures to be followed by industrial development agencies prior to making loans; includes goals to be achieved by project such as job creation, continuance of business or industry, and public purpose to be attained.
LawCode: Add ยง859-c, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to industrial development agencies
